name: PEPA & Co
description:
Pepa & Co’s collection consists of timeless and durable clothing for children aged newborn to eight years old.

Composed of Baby, Girl, and Boy collections, Pepa & Co. gathers together an elegant range of classic pieces, essential for your little one’s wardrobe: smart cardigans, hand-smocked dresses, bodysuits, traditional rompers, and bloomers, all in a soft palette of colours.

jobs.title: SOCIAL MEDIA & WEB CONTENT MANAGER
jobs.description:
We are seeking a highly motivated, enthusiastic and super organised candidate who is passionate about social Media, creative copywriting and the New Digital Industry within the children’s fashion world.

Are you a proactive and hardworking candidate interested in working with a fast-growing online company? Then you should apply for this role.
 
With no time to sit back on our heels, you will find in our office an exciting and perfect place to build a career in digital fashion. You will be working closely with our creative and insipiring founder, Pepa, as part of a small and busy team, therefore it is essential that staff is highly organized and can prioritize their own time. 

RESPONSABILITIES 

Devising and managing a dynamic social media strategy aligned to the brand strategy in order to rapidly grow the company customer base and increase sales turnover.
Creating, scheduling and posting social media content across social platforms in line with our Marketing Plan and in liason with our Digital Marketing manager.
Be fully up to date and informed regarding any new social media marketing developments and trends, and where applicable implementing these rapidly for the brand.
Be responsible for the accurate content and display of product information across the website.
Website copywriting, proofing and updating skills are essential, with copy aligned with relevant SEO Keywords.
Online Product and Category management – launch seasonal collections content in our site (Prepare and upload new product’s ensuring accurate features, category, attributes, pricing, photography, personalisation and meta descriptions)
Check and upload all product photography to ensure it is presented in accordance with brand presentation guidelines
Amend and remove lines promptly and efficiently in accordance with business merchandising strategies and in leasing with our Buyer.
Implement cross sell and upsell strategy for products, categories and collections as advised by Online Merchandiser
Pitch marketing campaigns and ideas to roll out across web and social channels 
Manage Blog. 1 per week. Weekly chose relevant topic and update website (work with great content to achieve this)
Manage Facebook/ IG. Inventory related to our Facebook ads
Prepare photos editing and copy for FB/IG ads.
Carry out Brand research and collaboration inquires 
Manage the brand Influencer program - researching top influencers to promote the brand and contact them for gifting 
Liaising with the brand PR manager and Web developers for general task - including updating and amending homepages, banners, shipping options, and page creation/amends in CMS
Manage brand collaborations 
 
Social Media Analytics and Insights : 
Drive the data agenda for social media, through tools and marketing initiatives. 
Track and report on performance, and continually optimise strategy and delivery
Develop testing strategies to support new insights, recommendations and optimisations.
Demonstrate social media ROI to ensure on-going investment and integration into all business plan
Actively seek out for innovation in social and digital to share with and educate the wider team
 
Skills & Profile : 
Must show initiative – We are a small and busy team, therefore it is essential that staff is highly organized and can prioritize their own time and workload without the need to be micro-managed.
Familiar with Shopify platform to update our website content.
Proficient in all Microsoft programs (excel, word) In order to manage our Inventory online system and reports
Past experience of working in social media and managing channels.
Must have knowledge of social media and digital marketing platforms.
Candidate must demonstrate outstanding communication skills both written and verbal.
Experience of working for a media publisher and driving traffic to editorial sites would be desirable
Experience in building and engaging existing communities as well as reaching out and attracting new ones
The ability to act quickly and react to trending topics and stories
Knowledge of key analytic tools (such as Instagram insights, google analytics )
Mid to high level photography & editing skills (Photoshop and ID)
Strong eye for visuals and able to create great storyboards
A strong editorial sense
Understand about SEO.
Hardworking, driven, motivated and focused
Interest in Retail and children clothing.
High attention to detail
Application:

Please apply with a CV and cover letter via the application form.
